name: Charizard G LV.X
author: Wataru Kawahara

poke_power.name: Call for Power
poke_power.effect: As often as you like during your turn (before your attack), you may move an Energy attached to 1 of your Pokémon to Charizard G. This power can’t be used if Charizard G is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Malevolent Fire
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If tails, discard all Energy attached to Charizard G.

rule_box: Put this card onto your Active Charizard G. Charizard G LV.X can use any attack, Poké-Power, or Poké-Body from its previous level.
